about_the_game:
You woke up one day with a dream. Harem full of demon girls… Wait… Agh HELL!




You go to sleep one day, and find yourself in a dream: exotic girls, monster girls, and yes demon girls too. Whether you dream of bedding lamias, onis, cowgirls or succubi, you’ve fallen into the right place, Dreamwalker.

Enter a realm of dreams to find adventures over and over again, striving to survive long enough to make it to one of three idyllic locales: the Succubus’ Castle, the Kitsune’s Abode, or the Dark Elven Fortress, all three with their sensual rulers; it’s up to your skill to reach the summit, but they decide whether you measure up. Impress them, and gain rewards far beyond what you ever thought possible, even in dreams.


  • The dev team tries to think of everything you might want from a game where fucking hot girls and going through dungeons is your mission!
  • Classic Roguelike/Roguelite gameplay: randomly-generated dungeons, predetermined levels, permanent death, turn-based action with full freedom!
  • Hacking and slashing, monster slaying? Hah! More like monster laying! No combat! All encounters are hot, heavy and sexual!
  • A diverse cast of women to encounter! Succubi, Vampires, Angels, Onis, Cow or Catgirls, Lamias and more! If you find it, you can fuck it!


  • Randomly generated dungeons (7 different "biomes", each with its own inhabitants);
  • 11 regular monsters with unique behaviour;
  • 29 items (which can be picked up, equipped and used by you, and also given to a girl as a present and maybe used by her);
  • 9 interactive objects (entities on the map that you can interact with in a certain way);
  • 7 temporary effects affecting you in various ways when acquired;
  • 3 random encounters (pre-generated levels with ability to unlock different endings each time you visit them);
  • 5 scenes with the Succubus, who you wish to join your harem one day;
  • 75 sexy images to unlock.

content_descriptors.notes:
The Girls of your Dreams contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (consensual/non consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-Sex with magical and mythical creatures (Orcs, Monster Girls, succubus & angels.)
-Cartoon/Fantasy Violence (combat with weapons in a text based format, turnbased combat)
-Drug and Alcohol (one scene where a potion is used to seduce a character)
-BDSM scenes involving characters in a sexual nature (bondage etc.)
-All characters in The Girls of your Dreams are 18+ and over

name: The Girls of your Dreams

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1035G1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
